title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 06, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 06, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### NET / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [abp (⭐14k)](https://github.com/abpframework/abp) - Open-source web application framework for ASP.NET Core! Offers an opinionated architecture to build enterprise software solutions with best practices on top of the .NET.
*   [LymeStack](https://www.lymestack.com/) - LymeStack is a full-stack, full-featured web application template & toolset designed to provide small businesses and organizations with an accelerated starting point when it comes to creating new apps and adding features to those apps.

### Internationalization / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-ecmascript-intl (⭐16)](https://github.com/json-derulo/angular-ecmascript-intl) - Contains pipes to transform internationalization data using Intl.\* browser APIs.

### DOM / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng-helpers (⭐6)](https://github.com/Jaspero/ng-helpers) - A collection of useful components, directives and pipes for Angular.

### File Upload / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-file-drop (⭐299)](https://github.com/georgipeltekov/ngx-file-drop) - Angular module for simple desktop file and folder drag and drop. This library does not need rxjs-compat.

### Form Controls / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-iban (⭐17)](https://github.com/fundsaccess/angular-iban) - IBAN directives and pipes for Angular.

### Layout Components / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [gridstack (⭐8.1k)](https://github.com/gridstack/gridstack.js/tree/master/angular/) - Mobile-friendly modern Typescript library for dashboard layout and creation. Making a drag-and-drop, multi-column responsive dashboard has never been easier. Has multiple bindings and works great with Angular.
items.content_html:
NET / Google Developer Experts

  • abp (⭐14k) - Open-source web application framework for ASP.NET Core! Offers an opinionated architecture to build enterprise software solutions with best practices on top of the .NET.
  • LymeStack - LymeStack is a full-stack, full-featured web application template & toolset designed to provide small businesses and organizations with an accelerated starting point when it comes to creating new apps and adding features to those apps.

Internationalization / Google Developer Experts

  • angular-ecmascript-intl (⭐16) - Contains pipes to transform internationalization data using Intl.* browser APIs.

DOM / Google Developer Experts

  • ng-helpers (⭐6) - A collection of useful components, directives and pipes for Angular.

File Upload / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-file-drop (⭐299) - Angular module for simple desktop file and folder drag and drop. This library does not need rxjs-compat.

Form Controls / Google Developer Experts

  • angular-iban (⭐17) - IBAN directives and pipes for Angular.

Layout Components / Google Developer Experts

  • gridstack (⭐8.1k) - Mobile-friendly modern Typescript library for dashboard layout and creation. Making a drag-and-drop, multi-column responsive dashboard has never been easier. Has multiple bindings and works great with Angular.

items.title: Awesome Gnome
items.content_text:
### Productivity and Time

*   [Time Tracker](https://flathub.org/apps/com.lynnmichaelmartin.TimeTracker) - Local-first project time tracker with sync option via cloud or network storage (CSV file).
items.content_html:
Productivity and Time

  • Time Tracker - Local-first project time tracker with sync option via cloud or network storage (CSV file).

items.title: Awesome Privacy
items.content_text:
### Version Control

*   [Radicle](https://radicle.xyz/) - An open source, peer-to-peer code collaboration stack built on Git. Unlike centralized code hosting platforms, there is no single entity controlling the network. Repositories are replicated across peers in a decentralized manner, and users are in full control of their data and workflow.
items.content_html:
Version Control

  • Radicle - An open source, peer-to-peer code collaboration stack built on Git. Unlike centralized code hosting platforms, there is no single entity controlling the network. Repositories are replicated across peers in a decentralized manner, and users are in full control of their data and workflow.

items.title: Awesome Mysql
items.content_text:
### Connectors

*   [MyZql (⭐51)](https://github.com/speed2exe/myzql) - MySQL and MariaDB driver in native Zig.
items.content_html:
Connectors

  • MyZql (⭐51) - MySQL and MariaDB driver in native Zig.

items.title: Awesome Ai Tools
items.content_text:
### Text / Chatbots

*   [ChatGPT](https://chatgpt.com) - *[reviews](https://theresanai.com/chatgpt)* - ChatGPT by OpenAI is a large language model that interacts in a conversational way.
items.content_html:
Text / Chatbots

  • ChatGPT - reviews - ChatGPT by OpenAI is a large language model that interacts in a conversational way.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Text-related Generative Tools / Multi-agents

*   [AI Story Generator (Advance Options)](https://aistorygenerator.chat/) Create Unique and Engaging Stories Instantly with Customized Tone, Genre, and Narration.
items.content_html:
Text-related Generative Tools / Multi-agents

  • AI Story Generator (Advance Options) Create Unique and Engaging Stories Instantly with Customized Tone, Genre, and Narration.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Methodologies for Experiments / Virtual Reality

*   [Agent: automatic generation of experimental protocol runtime](https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3139131.3139152) - ***VRST'17***, 2017. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=3511549412244980073)]. This paper proposes the use of Domain-Specific Languages (DSLs) to ease the description and generation of VR experiments, thus letting experiment designers focus on their core tasks: designing, conducting, and reporting experiments.
items.content_html:
Methodologies for Experiments / Virtual Reality

  • Agent: automatic generation of experimental protocol runtime - VRST'17, 2017. [All Versions]. This paper proposes the use of Domain-Specific Languages (DSLs) to ease the description and generation of VR experiments, thus letting experiment designers focus on their core tasks: designing, conducting, and reporting experiments.
